Docs.summary: An attribute that can be used to give programming advice to a user of a function or class.
Docs.remarks: This attribute is intended to give developers some guidance as to what to do. The contents of the attribute are displayed by the IDE when the user is using a feature like code analysis to give hints as to how to improve the code.
